name: Medicar: Push order from Shopify to Nhanh

parameters.name: data
parameters.value:
={"id":{{ $json["order_number"] }},
"customerName":"{{ $json["billing_address"]["name"] }}",
"customerMobile":"{{ $json["customerPhone"] }}",
"customerEmail":"{{ $json["customer"]["email"] }}",
"customerAddress":"{{ $json["billing_address"]["address1"] }}",
"customerWardLocationName":"{{ $json["billing_address"]["address2"] }}",
"customerCityName":"{{ $json["billing_address"]["city"] }}",
"paymentMethod":"{{ $json["payment_gateway_names"][0] }}",
"saleId": 3100490,
"trafficSource": "Website",
"status":"New",
"moneyTransfer":"{{ $node["Collect items of Order"].json["orderMoney"] }}",
"privateDescription":"{{ $node["Collect items of Order"].json["paymentNote"] }}",
"productList":{{ $json["products"] }}}
